presentation.label: XMLRPC
presentation.description: The XML-RPC presentation allows for interaction with the iDigi Dia through XML-RPC protocol. The address of the XMLRPC server will be http://[address of the device]/RPC2

setting.label: Use default Http Server
setting.tooltip: If this setting is set to True the XMLRPC server will start on its own port number. If false, XMLRPC services will be available on the default webserver built in to the Digi device.
